project_name: Full Bin  ESG Pro / Twin FM  Interviewer & Back Office MVP
summary: Text-first LLM interviewer, lead capture, consultant briefs, commission engine (35% pot), notifications. White-labelled to Full Bin (project lead).
branding: Full Bin project lead, small Full Bin logo in header, "Powered by Full Bin" footer, emails/SMS show Full Bin sender.
pricing_source: prices.json (extracted from ESG Pro Master Price List 18 NOV 2025 PARTNER VERSION.xlsx).
note_files: these documents can only be used in code execution
commission: 35% of gross_amount is commission_total. Split: Full Bin 50% / Spotted Cow 50% (rounding up to favour Spotted Cow).

deliverables: API route /api/interview (LLM prompt wrapper + deterministic rules)
